text: Revolutionary Workers League may refer to: *Revolutionary Workers League/Ligue Ouvrière Révolutionnaire, a Canadian Trotskyist group *Revolutionary Workers League (in Manitoba) *Revolutionary Workers League (Oehlerite), a U.S. group that existed in the 1930s, founded by Hugo Oehler *Revolutionary Workers League (U.S., 1976), a U.S. Trotskyist group founded in 1976 *Revolutionary Workers League (Britain), a British group in the late 1930s *Revolutionary Workers League (New Zealand) ==See also== *Workers Revolutionary League
title: Revolutionary Workers League
